Title: Provides a private right of action for nail specialists aggrieved by their employer in the case of a health and safety violation or retaliatory action
Summary: Provides a private right of action for nail specialists aggrieved by their employer in the case of a health and safety violation, unlawful retaliatory action, or general labor issues such as hours and breaks.
LawCode: Add ยง415-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to providing a private right of action for nail specialists aggrieved by their employer in the case of a health and safety violation, retaliatory action, or general labor issues
